DataSource.Query: WITH total_sales AS ( SELECT SUM(COALESCE(total_amount, 0)) AS total_sales_amount, COUNT(transaction_master_id) AS no_of_sales_transaction FROM sales.sales_view WHERE verification_status_id > 0 AND value_date = @ValueDate ), no_of_items_sold AS ( SELECT COUNT(checkout_details.item_id) AS no_of_items_sold FROM sales.sales_view LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_details ON checkout_details.checkout_id = sales_view.checkout_id WHERE verification_status_id > 0 AND sales_view.value_date = @ValueDate ) SELECT * FROM total_sales, no_of_items_sold;

WITH total_return AS ( SELECT SUM(checkout_detail_view.total) AS total_return_amount, COUNT(checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id) AS no_of_returned_transaction FROM sales.returns LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_detail_view ON checkout_detail_view.checkout_id = returns.checkout_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = returns.return_transaction_master_id WHERE transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.deleted = 0 AND transaction_master.value_date = @ValueDate ), no_of_items_returned AS ( SELECT COUNT(checkout_details.item_id) AS no_of_items_returned FROM sales.returns LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_details ON checkout_details.checkout_id = returns.checkout_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = returns.return_transaction_master_id WHERE transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.deleted = 0 AND transaction_master.value_date = @ValueDate ) SELECT * FROM total_return, no_of_items_returned;

WITH receivable AS ( SELECT SUM(sales_view.total_amount) amount FROM sales.sales_view WHERE verification_status_id > 0 AND is_credit = 1 AND sales_view.value_date = @ValueDate ), receipt AS ( SELECT SUM(COALESCE(customer_receipts.amount, 0)) as receipt_amount FROM sales.customer_receipts LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = customer_receipts.transaction_master_id WHERE transaction_master.deleted = 0 AND transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.value_date = @ValueDate ), purchase_amount AS ( SELECT SUM(checkout_detail_view.total) AS purchase_amount FROM purchase.purchases JOIN inventory.checkout_detail_view ON purchases.checkout_id = checkout_detail_view.checkout_id JOIN finance.transaction_master ON checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id = transaction_master.transaction_master_id WHERE transaction_master.value_date = @ValueDate AND transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 ), payment_amount AS ( SELECT SUM(amount) AS payment_amount FROM purchase.supplier_payments JOIN finance.transaction_master ON supplier_payments.transaction_master_id = transaction_master.transaction_master_id WHERE transaction_master.value_date = @ValueDate AND transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 ), expenses_accounts AS ( SELECT * FROM finance.accounts WHERE account_name = 'Expenses' AND deleted = 0 UNION ALL
SELECT finance.accounts.* FROM finance.accounts JOIN expenses_accounts ON finance.accounts.parent_account_id = expenses_accounts.account_id WHERE finance.accounts.deleted = 0 ), income_accounts as ( SELECT * FROM finance.accounts WHERE account_name = 'Revenues' AND deleted = 0 UNION ALL
SELECT finance.accounts.* FROM finance.accounts JOIN income_accounts ON finance.accounts.parent_account_id = income_accounts.account_id WHERE finance.accounts.deleted = 0 )
SELECT (SELECT amount - receipt_amount FROM receivable, receipt) AS receivable, (SELECT COALESCE(purchase_amount, 0) - COALESCE(payment_amount, 0) FROM purchase_amount, payment_amount) AS payable, ( SELECT SUM(amount_in_local_currency) AS total_expenses FROM expenses_accounts LEFT JOIN finance.verified_transaction_view ON verified_transaction_view.account_id = expenses_accounts.account_id WHERE verified_transaction_view.value_date = @ValueDate ) AS expenses, ( SELECT SUM(amount_in_local_currency) AS total_income FROM income_accounts LEFT JOIN finance.verified_transaction_view ON verified_transaction_view.account_id = income_accounts.account_id WHERE verified_transaction_view.value_date = @ValueDate ) AS income
